name: Feraligatr
flavorText:
When it bites with
its massive and
powerful jaws, it shakes its head
and savagely tears
its victim up.

previous.name: Croconaw
previous.flavorText:
If it loses a
fang, a new one
grows back in its place. There are
always 48 fangs
lining its mouth.

next.name: Sentret
next.flavorText:
A very cautious
POKéMON, it raises
itself up using its tail to get a
better view of its
surroundings.

pokemon.name: Totodile
pokemon.flavorText:
Its well-developed
jaws are powerful
and capable of crushing anything.
Even its trainer
must be careful.

pokemon.name: Croconaw
pokemon.flavorText:
If it loses a
fang, a new one
grows back in its place. There are
always 48 fangs
lining its mouth.
